Name: KoopaNpc
Notes: A small variant of Bowser that lies down on the ground. When attacked, he will stand up and get angry at the player. Unlike most NPCs, it cannot be talked to at all.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated. A bit buggy because it will always have appeared even if the switch is deactivated. Deactivating the switch again will fix this, though.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

DemoCast.Description: Can take part in a cutscene.

MarioFaceShipNpcRegister.Description: Can be registered to a Starship Mario NPC appearance event.
